meanings.definition: A person or thing that centralizes.
meanings.sent1: The centralizer of our group always makes sure everyone is on the same page.
meanings.sent2: The new software acts as a centralizer, streamlining our workflow.
meanings.sent3: The centralizer at the party kept everyone together on the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude served as a centralizer, bringing unity to the team.
meanings.sent5: The centralizer in the family, Grandma always brought everyone together for holidays.

meanings.definition: A device or substance used to centralize something.
meanings.sent1: The centralizer in the machine ensures all parts are aligned correctly.
meanings.sent2: The spacer acts as a centralizer, keeping the pipes in place.
meanings.sent3: The centralizer in the recipe made sure all ingredients were evenly mixed.
meanings.sent4: The compass was a centralizer, guiding us through the dense forest.
meanings.sent5: The centralizer in the puzzle helped organize the pieces for assembly.

meanings.definition: A mathematical concept that centralizes data or operations.
meanings.sent1: The centralizer in statistics simplifies the analysis of large datasets.
meanings.sent2: The algorithm acts as a centralizer, reducing the complexity of calculations.
meanings.sent3: The centralizer in math class made even the toughest problems seem easy.
meanings.sent4: The formula served as a centralizer, focusing our attention on key variables.
meanings.sent5: The centralizer in the equation helped us find the most efficient solution.
